catheter (tube) in your bladder

Forceps delivery
Your obstetrician will place 
metal forceps either side of 
your baby’s head.  When the 
forceps are in position, your 
obstetrician will hold them 
together. 
If your baby’s head is not 
facing towards your spine, your 
obstetrician will need to turn 
the head using the forceps.
They will pull gently as you 
push with your contractions 
to guide your baby’s head out.  
This can take several pulls a
